data.title: History of Hodson Trust Internships by Discipline
data.meta_description: See a complete list of past Hodson Trust Internships completed by students at St. John's College in Annapolis, Maryland.
data.text:
Hodson Internships by Discipline:

A Complete History 2000–23

Read our complete history through 2023 below. These are internships students have completed in the past, organized by discipline. Listings include the year the internship occurred, the student’s name and class year, the internship organization along with a brief description, and the internship location (city and state).
